import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Building2, Mail, Phone, MapPin, FileText, Edit, Save, X, Camera, } from "lucide-react"; const Profile = () => { const [isEditing, setIsEditing] = useState(false); const [profile, setProfile] = useState({ name: "Instituto Esperança", cnpj: "12.345.678/0001-90", area: "Educação", description: "Organização sem fins lucrativos dedicada a promover educação de qualidade para crianças em situação de vulnerabilidade social.", contactPerson: "Maria Oliveira", email: "contato@institutoesperanca.org", phone: "(11) 3333-3333", city: "São Paulo", state: "SP", address: "Rua das Flores, 123 - Centro", website: "www.institutoesperanca.org", socialMedia: { facebook: "institutoesperanca", instagram: "@institutoesperanca", linkedin: "instituto-esperanca", }, }); const [editProfile, setEditProfile] = useState({ ...profile }); const handleSave = () => { setProfile(editProfile); setIsEditing(false); }; const handleCancel = () => { setEditProfile({ ...profile }); setIsEditing(false); }; const handleInputChange = (field, value) => { setEditProfile((prev) => ({ ...prev, [field]: value })); }; const handleSocialMediaChange = (platform, value) => { setEditProfile((prev) => ({ ...prev, socialMedia: { ...prev.socialMedia, [platform]: value }, })); }; const areas = [ "Educação", "Saúde", "Meio Ambiente", "Assistência Social", "Cultura", "Esporte", "Direitos Humanos", "Tecnologia", "Outros", ]; const states = [ "SP", "RJ", "MG", "BA", "RS", "PR", "SC", "GO", "PE", "CE", "PA", "MA", "MT", "MS", "RO", "TO", "PI", "RN", "PB", "AL", "SE", "AP", "RR", "AC", "AM", "DF", ]; return (

{profile.cnpj}

{profile.contactPerson}
)}
